message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_CLIENT_CANCELLED
message.locale: This client is already canceled.
This client is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_CLIENT_PRIMARY
message.locale: This client is the primary client and cannot be canceled.
This client is the primary client and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_NO_CANCEL_CLIENT_ASSESSMENT_EXISTS
message.locale: A client cannot be canceled as a member of a Screening Case when Assessments still exist for them.
A client cannot be cancelled as a member of a Screening Case when Assessments still exist for them.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_CONCERN_ROLE_NOT_REGISTERED
message.locale: Concern role must be registered.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_NO_CANCEL_CASES_EXIST
message.locale: A client cannot be canceled when active cases still exist for them.
A client cannot be cancelled when active cases still exist for them.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_PARTICIPANTROLEID_BLANK
message.locale: Participant role ID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_FROMDATE_BLANK
message.locale: Start date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_PARTICIPANTROLE_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be earlier than the Participant Role start date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_PARTICIPANTROLE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be later than the Participant Role end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_TO_DATE_PARTICIPANTROLE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role end date must not be later than the Participant Role end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_TO_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be later than the end date.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_CASEHEADER_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be earlier than the Case start date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_FROM_DATE_CASEHEADER_END_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be later than the Case end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_XFV_TO_DATE_CASEHEADER_END_DATE
message.locale: The Case Participant Role start date must not be later than the Case end date - "%1d".

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_EXISTS
message.locale: This Participant already exists as ParticipantRole for this case.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_PRIMARY
message.locale: The Case Participant Role is already primary client.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_RECORDSTATUS
message.locale: The Case Participant Role is canceled and cannot be set as a primary client.
The Case Participant Role is cancelled and cannot be set as a primary client.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_FV_PARTICIPANT_CANCELED
message.locale: The Case Participant Role is canceled and cannot be modified.
The Case Participant Role is cancelled and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PARTICIPANTROLE_EXISTS
message.locale: This Participant already has a role as %1c for this case.

message.name: ERR_FV_MEMBER_NOT_ADDED_CASE_CLOSED
message.locale: A Case Member cannot be added to a case with a status of Closed.

message.name: ERR_CASE_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: A Case Member cannot be added to a case with a status of Closed.

message.name: ERR_MEMBER_EXISTS_AS_PLAN_PARTICIPANT
message.locale: The case member cannot be deleted as the case member is a plan participant on a service plan.

message.name: ERR_CASEPARTICIPANTROLE_AS_PRIMARYCLIENT_EXISTS
message.locale: This Participant already exists as Primary Client for this case.
